search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for FireText (firetext.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official FireText pricing page URL is: https://www.firetext.co.uk/pricing

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1: Wave](https://www.firetext.co.uk/themes/firetext/images/waves/lightback-2-down.svg)

### 500 credits[](https://www.firetext.co.uk/pricing#howmanycredits)

### £25.00

Each credit is 1 SMS fragment to 1 UK recipient

[Reply options available](https://www.firetext.co.uk/pricing#replyOptions)

[START FREE TRIAL](https://app.firetext.co.uk/signup)

Prices are excluding VAT

Your two-way SMS options
------------------------

Subscriptions without contract or commitment - there for when business calls.

 ![Image 2: UK Reply Number](https://www.firetext.co.uk/themes/firetext/images/pricing/uk-reply-number-1x.png)

### UK Reply Number

### £9 per month (ex VAT)

Send and receive messages straight into FireText. Set up keywords on your reply number to encourage inbound texts and segment your contacts.

 ![Image 3: Keyword on 82228 shortcode](https://www.firetext.co.uk/themes/firetext/images/pricing/82228-keyword-1x.png)

### Keyword on 82228

### £19 per month (ex VAT)

Advertise your keyword poster, bus or as part of your campaign. People can text the keyword to 82228 to opt in, and you can set up an automatic response for them.

 ![Image 4: Alannah and Ryan CSMs](https://www.firetext.co.uk/themes/firetext/images/pricing/alannah-and-ryan-1x.png)

### Support is our middle name

The team at FireText are INCREDIBLE! On hand anytime and superb response times to any queries! The team go out their way to support you and your business.

  [![Image 5: 5 stars on reviews.io](https://www.firetext.co.uk/themes/firetext/images/pricing/5-stars-1x.png)](https://www.firetext.co.uk/knowledge/reviews)

How many credits do I need?
---------------------------

Great question! It depends on the type of message you're sending, and how many people you're sending it to.

There's a ton included!
-----------------------

FireText have a large range of features, some of which are turned on by request - we make complicated systems a thing of the past!

### Frequently Asked Questions

#### What is a credit?

One credit is one standard text message to one person. For example, a 160 character message to 50 people would account for 50 credits. Longer messages can be sent too - they simply use additional credits as required.

#### Do credits expire?

No, credits can be used when it's good for you. This allows you to tailor your campaigns to your audience. Simply use your account only once in a 12 month period to keep your account active.

#### Do I have to sign a long term contract?

No. There are no long term contracts or commitments on your part. You simply pay per credit. Any reply numbers or keywords can be cancelled at any time.

#### How do I pay?

You can top-up your message credits at any time using a credit card. Reply numbers or keywords are billed each month, but you can cancel at any time. All prices exclude VAT.

#### Do you support entrprise customers?

We do indeed support enterprise customers with sending [bulk SMS!](https://www.firetext.co.uk/sms-marketing-features/bulk-sms) If you're looking to send more than 250,000 messages, please [get in touch with us.](https://www.firetext.co.uk/support)

#### Can I call you?

Of course! We're a UK-based team of SMS marketing experts. We're more than happy to assist. You can call us on: 0800 038 5522.

#### Is the account free?

Yes, and it always will be. You'll only pay for what you need meaning the account is super-flexible and easy to manage. There are no hidden charges or surprises.

#### Why FireText?

Our support is amazing! A dedicated SMS expert is included and on-hand to help you at every stage of your campaign - just ask.

Start sending bulk SMS in no time...
------------------------------------

##### 1

#### Sign up for an account

Pop in a few basic details to get started with a free trial account - no contract or credit card required.

##### 2

#### Await verification

As a trusted provider for the NHS and GOV, we manually verify every account to ensure a safe platform for all.

##### 3

#### We'll set you up!

Your new account manager will email you. We'll be here to hop on a call and chat through getting the best out of FireText.

[Try Texting Out](https://app.firetext.co.uk/signup)

Pricing for bulk and individual text messages through FireText's SMS marketing platform. Packed with features and outstanding support.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Prices exclude VAT. Credits do not expire and can be used flexibly.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Dedicated reply number for inbound and outbound SMS.
features: Set up keywords for inbound texts.
